department.ch: 應用地質研究所碩士班

goal.en: To introduce methods of hydrogeologic field survey and mapping, hydrogeologic maps of Taiwan, United States, Japan, Germany, United Kingdom and the Netherlands, and establish hydrogeologic conceptual model and its application to groundwater modeling; to instruct students in the field to perform hydrogeological survey and mapping, and construct a hydrogeologic conceptual model.
goal.ch: 介紹水文地質野外調查方法、製圖方法、台美日德英荷等國之水文地質圖、水文地質概念模式之建立及其地下水模擬應用;教導學生在野外進行水文地質調查及繪製水文地質圖,以及建構水文地質概念模式。

content.en:
1. Introduction
2.Planning a field investigation
3. Methods of field investigations
4. Methods of subsurface investigations
5. Describing sediments, rocks, and aquifers
6. Groundwater and sediment/rock sampling and drilling methods
7. Measurements of groundwater levels, stream flow, and sources/sinks
8. Geochemical measurements in the field and lab
9. Well design, pumping tests, and tracer tests
10. Hydrogeologic mapping (Taiwan, United States, Japan, Germany, United Kingdom, and the Netherlands)
11. Hydrogeologic reports
12. Application to groundwater modeling
(1)Construction of hydrogeologic conceptual model
(2)Transformation of hydrogeologic conceptual model to groundwater flow model
13. Case studies
14. Field practices
content.ch:
1. 前言
2. 野外調查規劃
3. 野外調查方法
4. 地下調查方法
5. 沉積物、岩石、及含水層之描述
6. 地下水及沉積物/岩石採樣與鑽探方法
7. 地下水位、河川水流、及源/匯之量測
8. 地球化學量測 (室外、室內)
9. 水井設計、抽水試驗、及示蹤劑試驗
10. 水文地質製圖(介紹台美日德英荷等國之水文地質圖)
11. 水文地質報告製作
12. 水文地質調查應用於地下水模擬
(1)水文地質概念模式之建立
(2)水文地質概念模式與地下水流模式之轉換
13. 個案分析
14.野外實作

textbook.en: (1) John E. Moore, and John F. Moore, 2017. Field Hydrogeology: A Guide for Site Investigations and Report Preparation, Second ed. Roca Raton, CRC Press (Taylor ＆ Francis Group), 206 p. (2) Rick Brassington, 2017. Field Hydrogeology, 4th ed. Wiley ＆ Sons. (3) Willis D. Weight and John L. Sonderegger, 2001. Manual of Applied Field Hydrogeology. McGraw-Hill Publishing Co., 608p. (4) Laura L. Sanders. 1998. A Manual of Field Hydrogeology. Upper Saddle River, N.J., Prentice Hall.
